task.title: DWF
task.shortdesc: Export ZWCAD drawings as Web DWF formats using DWFOUT or PLOT command. As a two dimensionalvector file, DWF publishes ZWCAD drawings on Web or Intranet network.

context.p: DWF file supports real-time panning or scaling and controls how the layers and named views are
To export a drawing to a DWF file

step.cmd: Choose File > Plot from the mainmenu.
Choose DWF6 ePlot.pc5 for the Name option from the Printer/plotter area on the Plot dialog box.
Specify the location and the name for the DWF file in Browse for Plot File dialog box.
